description: Designed and developed a pest control management platform with admin dashboard for handling customer details, service records, technician inputs (including signatures and photos), and PDF generation for documentation.
Created a responsive interior design company website with advanced animations using Framer Motion, implementing smooth transitions and interactive elements to showcase their portfolio and services.
Built various web applications for clients including e-commerce solutions, content management systems, and custom business tools using React, Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Assisted in developing and maintaining client websites, implemented responsive designs, and contributed to internal tools development while learning industry best practices.
